description.value:
Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-archetype-winding-stream-dancer.winding-stream-dancer-feats.Item.vlix0pDKMxTNYOJd]{Winding Stream Dance}.

You sweep your foe into your dance. Attempt an @Check[type:athletics|defense:reflex] check against an adjacent enemy's Reflex DC.

Critical Success Your foe is swept up in your dance. You both move up to 5 feet in the same direction, remaining adjacent to one another. Your movement doesn't trigger reactions from the target (and the target's movement doesn't trigger reactions because it's forced movement). After you both move, your target falls and lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Success As critical success, but you both move only 5 feet.

Failure The foe doesn't follow your steps. You can move 5 feet if you choose, but this movement triggers reactions normally.

Critical Failure You stumble, falling @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} in your space.
